function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of domain knowledge in workers from crowdsourcing platforms for managing medical information","Impact":"Lower quality dataset, potentially leading to incorrect or incomplete information","Mitigation":"Employ expert sourcing for collecting answers for medical questions, use domain experts to judge unresolved pairs","Technologies":"N/A","People":"Workers from crowdsourcing platforms","Owner":"Project managers"},{"Description":"Inaccurate or incomplete medical data in the KGs","Impact":"Misinformation, potentially leading to incorrect medical decisions or analysis","Mitigation":"Manual evaluation of the quality of each KG, continuous update of the data set along with the occurrence of COVID-19","Technologies":"N/A","People":"Project managers, domain experts","Owner":"Project managers"},{"Description":"Sampling and labeling process might not represent the entire dataset","Impact":"Inaccurate assessment of the quality of the KGs","Mitigation":"Adopt a sampling strategy similar to Yago, rely on domain experts to judge unresolved pairs","Technologies":"N/A","People":"Project managers, domain experts","Owner":"Project managers"}]}
